description.translate: Separate the head from the body, and voila!

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5La décapitation pour les nuls\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Séparez la tête du corps,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et le tour est joué !\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Separate the head from the body,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and voila!\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HER§a1 §7HUN§a1 §7HAS§c-1\"}"]}}
